content.detailedDescription: Night photography, images say it all, many instances. these were not edited except for lightroom exposure contrast etc. did not modify pixels   the is a red cube.
content.summary: Photos plus reflection off still water

content.detailedDescription:
I was at a local park with a friend of mine sitting on the swingset and talking. it was early evening, getting darker but still plenty of light - the sky was still blue. there were some clouds but they were light and only covered about 40% of the sky i would say. 

both of us were looking out at the sky in front of us. the park is on a very slight hill, enough of a hill to put us at about the same height as the two-story house's rooftops across the street in front of us. there is a small marshy forest behind us, a public outdoor swimming pool to our left, a retention pond to our right, and a tennis court, a two-lane boulevard, and some houses in front of us. we are sitting almost directly under some powerlines that stretch for miles in front of and behind us. 

we are sitting on some swings side by side and my friend is bent over tying his shoe. i'm still staring straight ahead. i see a bright flash and immediately ask my friend if he saw it too. he says no - he was looking at his shoes. 

this flash is unlike anything i've seen before. sort of like a falling star but huge. i've worked in metal shops before and staring right at the flash is kind of like staring at welding torch's flame. different colors but the same intensity. i can see it for at most five seconds, it is gone quicker than i can properly process it. bright, bright white, maybe a little green or even pink around the edge, like a huge streak of tv static falling down the sky. it appeared out of nowhere close to the horizon and quickly dissapears behind it, falling diagonally and so so fast. i think it was comet-shaped, but so bright i can't be sure. it looks very small and very far away, miles and miles away i would guess.  

i remember just being very, very confused and wondering why a shooting star was out so early, how it was so bright and slowly thinking that it couldn't be a shooting star could it? i regularly go watching for shooting stars at night so i've seen my fair share, and even the biggest ones i've seen didn't compare to this. it was bigger around, much faster, and fell at an angle i don't see stars fall at. i ask my friend if he saw it, he says no, i describe it to him, and he says maybe it was a crashing plane or something. we both agree it couldnt be. we stay there watching the sky for about another hour to see if we can find anything else before giving up and moving on to meet up with some other friends. i get a little excited and tell a bunch of my friends about it, sending them a picture of the evening sky taken minutes after i saw the flash. sadly i no longer have that photo, though i have no idea if it could've done any good. i feel confusion and excitement are pretty reasonable things to experience and don't think my mental state was affected much, if at all, by this. if anything, it gave me an odd sense of calm but i was already feeling pretty relaxed so i couldn't blame it all on that.  

i have waited almost a month to make this report because a) i've been trying to figure out exactly what it was i saw and b) i wasn't sure if it was a big enough deal to make a report on. i figure it couldn't hurt though. and i can't think of anything reasonable that this flash could have been. regardless of what this streak actually is it isn't something normal, it isn't something that i have ever seen before, not something anyone i know has seen before.  it's weird and i can't explain it. thank you for your time and i hope this helps you out somehow.
content.summary: Saw a blinding bright streak fastly descending in the evening sky

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 11:15pm on 20 sep 2015 in colorado springs, co,  i witnessed a chevron shaped object with 10 dim white lights move from directly overhead in a southwesterly direction at what i estimate to be 250 knots.  the object was dim enough to be lost in the city light pollution after about 8-10 seconds.  the object was observed approximately 2 miles south of the south entrance to the us air force academy and appeared to fly towards a point at or just north of cheyenne mountain.

the altitude appeared to be above 1000 feet agl.  

i estimate speed and altitude based on my experience in aviation.  the feature of the sighting that strikes me most is the absolute lack of noise- the object was visible for approximately 8 seconds but i continued to listen for noise of any kind for 5 minutes.  no exhaust noise or echo, no sound that might indicate a low flying glider.  no nav or position lights, no pulsed or flashing lights, simply the dim white lights that indicated the chevron shape.
content.summary: Chevron shaped object with dim white lights observed directly overhead and moved sw at high rate of speed

content.detailedDescription:
I was camping in valley of fire state park for probably my 4th year in sept. or oct. 1991, with a view down the park's main valley.  i woke needing to answer nature's call and checked my watch:  5:00. as i exited the tent, i heard a voice in my head--a voice mine yet not mine, as if synthesized far away and 'made' mime.  it said, sounding each syllable, "you might see something strange out there." i walked several yards and squatted in the sand.  as i looked up, i saw the sky was still pitch black and strewn with stars.  a large golden ball of light was coming toward my area from the east where lake mead is.  it was 2 miles away, even with the visitor center, moving east.  it glowed but emitted no rays; no sound; no variation in speed or heigth.  the closer it came, within 1/2-mile of me or less, the more astonishing and beautiful it seemed.  at that point i again heard that voice in my mind, just 2 words, again deliberately sounding each syllable:  "spiritual intelligence".  it made a smooth 90-degree turn to the north and disappeared behind the cliffs closest to the campground, perhaps 1/2-mile or less distant.  the cliffs are about 250-ft. high, which is how i guaged it's elevation.  it was lower than the cliff.  i knew it would come to a box canyon very quickly if it did not change its trajectory.  i waited perhaps 10 mins for the sound of a crash or its reappearance, buy neither happened.

the psychological effects were profound.  i felt blessed, and very disturbed.  no one was interested.  i felt isolated. perhaps the most profound experience of my life and no one to share it with.  i constantly thought about and replayed the globe of light.  i wondered if my mind concocted the "spiritual intelligence" as a way of coping with my observation.  even so, i couldn't explain hearing the warning on exiting mt tent that fateful day.

i told my father, a career air force pilot who was also instrumental in then-classified programs and working with the cia on aerial surveilance imaging systems.  he ascribed what i saw to a weather balloon, or the effect of the  sunrise soon to .Come above the horizon.  i started reading ufo books, especially about orbs in yakima valley, wa.  i'd been an earth sciences student, so i could buy a theory about orbs above the also very fault-ridden valley of fire.  but the yakima orbs were small and moved erraticalaly, unlike what i saw.  i came to learn the valley of fire is a ufo .Hot spot.  earlier than my 1991 sighting, i'd watched what i assumed was a satellite until it stopped suddenly and reversed its path against the stars.
content.summary: Large silent gold ball of light about 250-ft above ground smoothly sailed from west to east,smooth turn90-deg. north

content.detailedDescription: Driving south bound on interstate i89 between middlesex and montpelier. it was bright and glowing like it was a star. but moved like something or someone was in control of it. a person stopped in the break down lane to observe it. i was in a hurry so i kept going but watched it.
content.summary: It hovered for about ten seconds then bounced like kick ball then shot straight up it was bright white

content.detailedDescription: On the date & location near 9mile/ woodward, i was sitting on the porch of my apartment building. the night sky was clear & cloudless. i observed what appeared to be a star-like object low on the horizon in a wnw direction. i thought it was too low to be a star, even though i could see it was twinkling with my naked eye. i went in the house & grabbed 2 different pairs of binoculars & my samsung galaxy cell phone with an 8mp camera. i observed thru binoculars a disc shaped object, covered in red/ green pulsating lights. the object was mostly stationary, with an occasional side to side movement. the object(s)appeared to also divide into 2 & then merge back together. one of the divided parts looked like a ring that had pulsating red/ green lights rotating in a counter- clockwise spin. i used my cell to take several still photos, as best i could. i don't know what it was but i know it wasn't an airplane. planes aren't stationary & don't move from side to side, or divide into two. i don't think it was a helicopter, because they only have a couple navigation lights. this thing was covered with lights. i observed this for about a half an hour. i was pretty excited about what i was seeing. definitely never seen anything like it before. the cell photos show some definite shape changing going on, when they are zoomed in. the photos are available on request, if someone wants to analyze them. pretty interesting.
content.summary: Red & green, twinkling, starlight object seen in wnw skies, near my location at night.

content.detailedDescription: While on a vacation in northern michigan my wife took this picture of the sun and trees, when she checked it out she noticed this odd orb which was not visible to the naked eye, when she zoomed in on it piqued my curiosity.   would love an explanation.  thank you
content.summary: My wife took this photo with an  s6 the object was not visible to the naked eye.

content.detailedDescription:
the date is september 20, 2015, approximate time 3:30 pm. i watch the sky often and this would make my fourth sighting i have experienced. all four sightings were different' but this one was special because i finally got a picture that proves i saw something. is it a plane i don't know, something else, i don't know.
    anyways i was working in my yard mid afternoon when i took a break and sat on the swing in my back yard. im looking at the ground in my back yard checking out a new fire pit i just finished putting in. then this flash of light from the sky causes me to actually look up into the sky. this flash gets very bright and i can feel the light hitting my eye and then there this white sphere or light is in the sky just floating across the sky. i wear glasses and i am not wearing them at the time but i can tell i never seen anything like this before. about 2 minutes go by when i decide to take a picture. first picture nothing so i take another. got it! not the best pictures but i actually have it in both photos. pictures were taken with my cell phone. no matter what i saw i have a picture this time to prove im not crazy. so with that out of my system lets move onto some more facts about that day.
     i have lived in cleveland ohio my entire life and hopkins air port is a part of my life. i see planes all the time in the sky and hear them also. this day was so nice because clear blue sky's and no planes, at all. i didn't see one plane all day. i don't know what i saw, but i feel like i really saw something special. i made a video a couple hours after taking photos to show the quit cleveland sky and give some reference points if you decide to further investigate this case. is this the one? no, but at least i got a photo to show there was something in the sky this time. 
    thanks for being here, its nice to get this off my chest. this is my fourth sighting and all four where complete different. i don't know how down load photos from my phone to the computer, but as soon as i figure it out i will send the pictures and my video for reference points.
content.summary: A bright flash got my attention' i looked up' a flash then the object appeared and continued floating across the sky slow, quit and striaght.

content.detailedDescription:
Dear mufon,

i am reaching out to you with some information and evidence that may prove to be of some value to you.  we are located in central ohio.

sept. 10th of this year, the sky was mostly cloudy w/a few breaks.  shortly after sunset, i was certain i spotted something that looked like a very slow moving triangle ufo at an est. ¼ - ½ mile straight overhead.  it quickly, was hidden by clouds.

sept.12th, at 9:15p est, i clearly spotted an identical triangle at an est. ¼ mile directly overhead.  two red lights, and one white headlight.  my wife and i watched this craft make impossible 90° and 45° maneuvers, in very short distances, directly overhead.  several minutes later, a 2nd identical craft joined this one, and the first craft existed the area.  10 – 15 minutes later, an incredibly bright and very low light appeared from the north.  it was moving very slow and i thought it was a jet on approach.  big mistake.  minutes later, our power was shut down for about 10 seconds, and i totally missed seeing the craft, which, most likely was right overhead, again.

sept. 12th, 10:05p est, i observed the same bright light approaching from the north, and again, i had no camera with me.  i boldly stood as the craft centered directly between my eyes and came overhead at an est. 15 – 20 mph.  it presented what appeared to be a full display of lights, including a ring of brilliant red individual lights, dead center in the belly of the craft.  it was lit like ‘times square’ and utterly silent.  again, a triangle.  this time, left light red and right, green.  the head-beam was brighter than the moon, cast for a couple miles forward, at least, and came over at an est. 125’.  they allowed me to see the entire craft.  i was in awe! and … i wasn’t the least bit frightened.  i think the light mesmerized me.  if it were any lower, i could have hit it with a rock.  as it was about to exit our property, the only sound it made was a low crackling sound.  the back edge was trimmed with yellow oblong ports.  i got a great look at the craft, but missed a sensational photo op!  this struck me as an anti-gravity mode, as the giant craft barely moved through the air, with no wind being generated.

next couple days, i spotted a couple high altitude triangles, but nothing that i could photograph.

sept. 18th, another triangle came over just before 11p est moving at an est. 200 mph and only displayed the three lights; white, red, and green.  i literally had just taken my cam in 3 minutes earlier to protect it from condensation.  it was at an est. 1000 feet.  sounded like a jet.

sept. 19th, i got it on video!  moving at an est. 200 mph and only displaying the same light configuration.  the video is hand-held (sorry for the jerkiness), but you pros should be able to view it frame by frame.  we lost power again this night at an est. 4:30a and just before 11a (sunday).

we have had a history over the past 10 months of very peculiar power surges and ringing phones, simultaneously.  i have every reason to believe it is some form of an emp or emf, at least, that is being directed at our home, from these crafts.

as you are all aware of the aurora project, the aurora does not move at 45° or 90° angles, nor can it fly at 20 mph and stay in the air.  i have every reason to believe these are all alien space crafts.  if you will, imagine the $100s of billions one aurora would cost to build … and … then … there are 2 of them over my property at once?!  i don’t think so.  these triangles are being seeing all over the globe, hence, there is no way the us govt. could afford to build and operate 100s or 1000s of these incredible machines.  i have to believe, something bigger is going on here.

respectfully,
skyhawk
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: About 9 days worth of multiple triangle sightings at different alts. and lights - video attached

content.detailedDescription:
It was about 6:40am, my wife was making breakfast in the the kitchen, looked out the window.. she spotted an object about half mile away at an altitude of around 1000 feet..She came to the bedroom to get me, but in those few seconds it was gone. around 3 minutes later i stepped out on the balcony to have a cigarette and just as i lit it i saw it. it resembled a radio controlled helicopter but a helicopter that flipped and tumbled on every axis.Shifted 
direction instantly moving left to  right, each horizontal motion covered around 200-400 feet a second before changing direction. it did this for around 4 minutes, i can best describe it as hinged in the center like a pair of scissors  and moved like how a butterfly knife looks when twirling it around. it disappeared into a cloud and as it it stopped spinning and slowly ascended into clouds. ive seen unexplained lights and strange objects only a few times in my life. this has to be the strangest because we saw it so clear.
content.summary: X shaped tumbling and spinning ufo

content.detailedDescription: We saw a red & blue lights moving very slowly coming downward then up then stopping then turning left then right no sound.It was coming towards where we were standing in garden when i started to take photos it then started to move away very slowly and drop down lower out of view behind the trees. what made us aware of the object was the bright colour. we notice it because of the way it was moving never seen anything move like that before. we felt excited to see this something out of the ordinary never seen anything move like this. it was obvious it was something flying in the sky,
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Red lights with blue tail cylinder shape silent hovering moving up & across l/to r.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
Jets sound came first, looked up and around because it was quite a large sound. sound appeared to die away for a couple of seconds and then the sky erupted with an instantaneuosly much larger sound of jets. at this point now i know exactly where to look automatically and saw what appeared to be a large object dark coloured, flat bottom, dome top appeared to have some structure to it but was partly obscured by a number of jets escourting the object at what i presume to be stalling speed because the jets where blowing a bit of carbon cloud from their engines.

i chuckled to myself that this is something similar to a youtube video someone in the united states had submitted some while back. i told my good frind whm i think didnt really believe me and kept silent.
did i see this??
did anyone else report this?
hope so but it may turn out to be something military.
sound for a second orso then i saw this for around 2-3 seconds as i stopped to look up and was framed 3/4 by buildings and a wall. 
they where quite low and appeared to be heading from my south towards a noth easterly direction.
content.summary: Man made looking disc craft escorted by jets.

content.detailedDescription: I have been experiencing close encounters,  abductions, manipulation and a lot of other experiences including being on some sort of a tv show where they sedate my family and i and then rape, torture and murder us violently and then disect us and then put us back together so they can do it all over again the next night.   every night all night for ayears now.   the people involved are the trsvelers from the mexican military and the cubans.   both presidential families and they're obviously represented and have the ability to turn humans into energy to make transport easy and the possibility of being caught almost impossible.   they record it all in the woods and peoples houses and it airs on direct tv and local internet..    i'm being told that this is the night i die and need u desperately to investigate and inform the united states military and government immediately. please!   thank you so much for your time and i pray i see you in the very near future!
content.summary: Approximately 7-8 different species observed to date.  over the past couple of years.
Happens wvery

content.detailedDescription: I do have 15 min video and several photos available
content.summary: Observed ufo several day's already

content.detailedDescription: I had just got back from my walk and my husband then took our dog out for a pee at around 10:30 when he was done he came in and said you will not believe what i just saw, a big orange ball of light with a dot of yellow on it, he said i thought it was a falling star but it was way to big and went completely across the sky (at around 10:35), i thought ok probably a satalight or something, so we went outside again and at around 10:40 we seen another one going in the same path, i was blown away, and concerned, i wasn't really a believer in that kind of stuff, i had seen just orange glowing or flaming something and appeared to be the shape of like a fighter jet, but was completely beaming orange, with a glow, i thought maybe a metor, that wouldn't explain the the size or shape or the same path the first one took, it was at least 100 time the size of a star, then i thought what if it is a missel but it was much to big, it just reminded me in the movies of what they look like going through the sky, but that would explain the 2 in a row, i also thought it may be government testing thing, it was way to fast for a satilight, then i thought maybe a unknown space or air craft, what ever it was it was fast, it went across our sky with in about 45 sec, and it was huge, but made no sound and there was no trail.  i was just praying it was not something harmful, nothing was on the news in the morning, i was just hoping for some explanation to what it was.  my husband loves looking at the stars at night, that is how he 1st noticed it.  we tried to see if another one was going to come but the sky started to cloud over after about 10 min, and the bugs were bad, i just wish we could have had binoculars ready or a camera, it was just so quick you just stood in awe, are kids thought it was pretty cool.
content.summary: 2 same glowing very large glowing orange objects 5 min apart traveling in the same path at 10:35 and 10:40. pm

content.detailedDescription:
We were taking the dog for a walk and the sky was pretty clear that night.
suddenly, we (my wife and i) saw a v-shaped ufo flying over the city making absolutely no noise and heading to miami (s, se). 
its lights were something different. have never seen one of this type. 

the second one was about 2 minutes later, but it was a ball though.. the interesting point is that it was bouncing while passed over the city. it was in a high speed. we were shocked because it's movements were totally different from anything.

so we were amazed by the sightseeing and we decided to take our chairs out of house and stare the skies in order to find more flying. and we did. we could see 2 more objects. they looked like a straight line, but i believe there were 4 or 5 flying side-by-side very close. these ones very discrete, low lights, no noise as the other ones, heading s, se.

one important fact we could notice is that usually we can see many airplanes flying around to reach not only fort lauderdale airport but the miami too. at that night, we only saw 2 airplanes flying not so high (like they were about to land on one of the airports).

definitely it was an experience we will never forget. i tried to film the first one with my cellphone, but i was so perplex with the v-shape sightseeing that i could not keep filming. i feel sorry for that right now. i could make it better for everybody.
content.summary: 4 flying objects over pembroke pines (1- v-shaped; 2- ball; 3,4 - line)

content.detailedDescription:
I am writing to you because i saw something unusual while in my backyard.

i decided to let you know that:
yesterday, september 19th, 2014 i was at my backyard in my home (miami, fl) taking some fresh air and looking at the stars. after a few rainy days it was nice to look around and see the sky. the night was clear, no clouds at all when suddenly i saw something moving north west to south east. it was a huge translucent manta ray shape object.  it was transparent so i can see the stars through that and it has like a border around the shape in gray or white(that was the reason i know how it looks)  it was moving softly with no lights, no sound and seems to be like around 500 ft. the movement was from nw to sw. it has no sound and no lights. it was huge but awesome and i keep  looking at that until it disappeared in the distance.



sincerely,

n. montti
content.summary: Translucent manta ray ufo

content.detailedDescription:
Was rolling a smoke walk to back door look up and see a bright orb sphere looking like ball going in the sky it making no sound i cald my oldest daugther and we look at it like 5 min i have sstuding like a year to know what is was still dont know but it opens me eyes beter then people whant to lets us believe we get treated like stuppid people and people say we ar nuts but i  know what i see and its easy with a good flashlight to call these things or orbs and they give signaals back in time so where can we go with our story ? its life changing for me life stops and strange things happening around us even the system looks corrups to us 
have a good day peace
content.summary: Silent orb like bright light

content.detailedDescription: We outside watching traffic just kicking back when we notice the lights moving around in the sky. i got my binocs. and started lookin at most of them. one landed on a mountian looking over the valley u can see it plan view it just sat there for about 1.5 hrs. it got cold so we went in came. back out 1hr later.It was hovering towards other lights some bigger than it watch it leave.

content.summary: 339 we where  sitting on back porch when we noticed the lights grabed the binocs. then watch till 330am when it started slowly rising to s.E there were other lights maybe 19 or more.

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my terrace watching the beautiful sky and at the moment i had a feeling of something like watching me and i looked on the sky then there was a chopper.

the thing which made me observe the object was a light bright light at the sky.

i thought that it was a star.

after a moment i saw that the object was started moving at a very high speed and i never saw such a speed in my entire life and then when that sphere starts desending 
then i was shocked and taken cover behind walls.

unfortunately i forgotten my mobile and i cant click any pictures of that object.

after exact 20 minutes the object ascends and lost in the clouds.
content.summary: I was walking on my terrace and suddenly saw a sphere ball of light moving at a high speed.

content.detailedDescription: On my way to work at 9:55 pm i witnessed 7 fire orbs floating in the nite sky changing formations but all still moving in the same direction. i pulled over and watched for about 2 mins, tryed to get a video but it didn't come out very clear. i called my dad to tell him to come outside and see them as i turned my car around to get a better view as they moved behind some trees. when i turned back around they had vanished.
content.summary: 7 fire orbs moving togather, but changing formations. then all disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
1. outside having a late night smoke.
2.Stargazing 
3.Due to the speed and lack of sound or lights. knew it was nothing in the "norm"
4.Smooth and fast flight
5.Excitement and doubt. 
6. lost sight due to tree line.
content.summary: Gray in color craft speeding by at high speed with no sound. activity seems to have increased in local area.

content.detailedDescription:
On the morning of 9/14/2015 @ 6:00am, i let my cat out (which i do every morning), i looked directly toward the eastern sky, towards a well known plane manufacture co. i saw a very brite light (directly above this plane manufacturing co.) that did not move, and up a little higher and more south east, there was another brite light, slowly moving upwards. at first i thought it was stars, since it was still a lil dark outside, but the sky was clear, except just below the 
"first brite light,"  was a "chem trail" or should i say exhaust trail from a previous plane.
so i asked my boyfriend to come an check this out. he took a look at both brite lights, got frightened an ran back inside. i then grabbed my tablet, and 
video taped what i had seen. when i zoomed on the light, it was illuminating, throwing off different colors. my boyfriend described it as looking as if the light
was vibrating.
for some reason i could not film the second light on my video, while the first light did not move, the second one was climbing upwards.
i had to go inside to get ready for work, when we left around 6:50, both lights were gone.
later that day i told my father about it, he said he seen the same "first brite light" that i had, he also says he does not known what it was.
content.summary: Two bright lights

content.detailedDescription:
Saw it 4.14, keep its distance, did not come closer. but it move up and down

and right to left. saw it for some 2 hrs, then it went.

can raf confirm they have craft in the area at this time. or do i see this

craft unknown.
content.summary: Same as before

content.detailedDescription: Five of us witnessed an object that changed both shape and color that remained for well over 3 hours..Moving left to right and slowly upwards. much to high for radio control, certainly not any type of drone or aircraft. it is positioned midway up the horizon, towards the north/east and changes from an orb, to a ring, to a triangle, to a ring with dots around the circumference. at least 10 x brighter than any star in the sky
content.summary: Ufo

content.detailedDescription: My neighbor described the sighting, she woke up around 5:30 to use the restroom and noticed the time then she saw out her bedroom window facing southwest, a glowing orange orb. she said it looked bigger than the moon and was descending slowly. she watched it in wonderment not knowing what it was. she expected to hear a crash but didn't witness a landing because it went behind trees. she didn't hear anything to suggest it landed or crashed.
content.summary: It was a glowing orange orb looking bigger than the moon. slowly descending until the observer couldn't see it past the treeline.

content.detailedDescription: Its been a bi nightly occurrence. around 10 or eleven at night a white star like thing appears in the sky blinking multiple color lights, tonight i decided to make a report. the first night it was in the western sky west north west then it drifted across the sky and got lost in light pollution. same with second sighting. they were september 15 and 17. tonight september 19) its in the east north east sky. east of  the constellation draco. seemed like it was drifting towards us. with binoculars it looked like a ferris wheel on its side. without it looked like a white star changing blue white red and green. its moves too slow for an airplane too erratic for a satellite and airplanes have flown past it. i have crappy video on my cell which for some reason cant be uploaded anywhere, i can possibly email it? after watching it move across the sky i started getting a headache and nausea. the light ejected red flare like things that appeared to have dissipated shortly after ejection.  the weather the past week has been calm clear and partly cloudy. with a calm wind.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: With binoculars it looks like a ferris wheel. with the naked eye it looks like a star changing colors

content.detailedDescription: Seen lights moving all around unlike anything man can fly.Hovered dropped down behind tree line.People have had to seen this it was right there for everybody to see.
content.summary: Seen lights in sky approx,1 mile away go back and fourth up and down,then hover and dropped behind tree line fast. maybe 5 seconds to drop about 3000ft. but controlled

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription:
On back patio in lounge chair , noticed at first some lights brighter then the stars and longer ,with binoculars could see on sept 12 through tonight the 19th like a oval shape of bright lights and a pulsating red and green light just above the bottom rim of bright lights . i have witnessed this the last 8 days. i am a older lady 55 and only have binoculars , cant afford a camera right now, they are best seen when it is the clear dark night the darker the better , i pray you dont disguard this because i only have two drawings i made the best i could to explain them at first sept 12th they had more of a translucent almost shaped like a contact lens with a web of millions of tiny bright twinkling  stars ligts in  a dome shape coming out of  cirular base of very bright sections of lights forming a disk or oval shape, they line up three in a row many time and also form into triangles. i pray this is taken seriously. thank you so much for your help. they are above st. clair county michigan ( fort gratiot/ port huron ) and sarnia ontario canada. i i knew it was not normal  a ufo of some sort . i am very shocked this is happening so close so many sometime can see many and they can disaperar and  like a breath and reapear. i don't know how to feel i feel somewhat anxious want some one else to take the time and see these , many time the daylight cause loss of sight manytimes they fade. please help me to keep my sanity lol but seriously. many times can see as soon as it get real dark 10 pm to daylight tonight 9/19/2015 saw over 20 of them they are there right now.
thank you
